about_the_game:
The game takes place on Earth in the distant future. The familiar world is threatened by a threat from the past. As it turned out, an ancient race of highly intelligent beings owned this world long before people. They called themselves "The Firstborn". But a few million years ago, a meteorite hit the Earth, destroying 90% of life on the planet and making it almost uninhabitable. To save their species, the originals had to go to sleep, hibernating their city for years to come.

Kirk Hussl, a former Special Forces soldier and now a thief, received an order from an anonymous author for an interesting artifact hidden in the ocean. Having sailed to the coordinates indicated by the anonymous, he discovered an unusual crystal. Removing it with the bathyscaphe's manipulator, he provoked an explosion that damaged the power supply system of the hibernation pods in the city of the originals. From the explosion, Kirk falls in the bathyscaphe and hits his head, losing consciousness, but before that, having time to order the system to ascend. Kirk regains consciousness while in a local prison.

A young girl, Zendaya, an antiquities hunter, goes to the ruins in search of "artifacts" that will pay well. Ancient treasure hunter. By nature, she is an adventurer, often looking for adventure in very dangerous places. Green-eyed brunette. Smart, well-built, she travels the world in search of various artifacts, she decides to explore the city of the originals that arose on the site of the ruins of Wilmington.

An archeology student named Yoko leads his own personal investigation into the causes of the cataclysm. Everything that was dear to him, everyone he loved, died in this tragedy. He returned to the city to find out the truth about what happened and visit his ruined house. A typical nerd, somewhat naive and funny.

Meanwhile, the ancient city of the first-born people, "Gentem", has risen from the abyss and ascended into the skies to find a new location on land, splashing out a wave of energy in the process that destroyed part of the east coast of the United States. The release was the result of a failed battery in one of the life support systems of the ancient city. The city of Wilmington fell into ruins, many people died, and the rest lost their homes. The ruined city became the new foundation for Gentem. The Originals decide to start a process of controlled terraforming of the Earth in order to bring the climate to a state suitable for them. This threatens the disappearance of all mankind from the face of the earth.


Hussl breaks out of prison, and the ruins of Wilmington become the only place to hide. Meanwhile, Yoko is sent to investigate the scene of the tragedy, and Zendaya, the city itself. Chance brings all three heroes together. They learn about the plans of the originals and try to stop them.

- The ruins of the city are waiting for you, in place of which there is now a completely different city - the City of the Firstborn who rose from the depths of the ocean; - Three characters whose story you have to reveal;
- Dynamic battles with many unique abilities of all three characters;
- The game world in the genre of metroidvania divided into 6 zones;
- Memorable enemies;
- Dynamic, fast-paced plot;
- Ability to create items;
- Heroes have unique skills of their own;
- A variety of missions with intricate goals!
- Very cool music!
detailed_description:

Resurrection of mind

The game takes place on Earth in the distant future. The familiar world is threatened by a threat from the past. name: Resurrection of mind

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual-core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia or AMD graphics card. 512 MB OpenGL 2.0+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit edition of Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual-core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia or AMD graphics card. 512 MB OpenGL 2.0+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Metroidvania with an intriguing narrative about three heroes. Each hero has a unique combat system. Exciting adventures are waiting for you. The story involves a confrontation between the firstborn and humans. The appearance of a strange crystal further twists the intrigue around the events.
